content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
The Cayley-Hamilton Theorem
Stephan Adelsberger, Stefan Hetzl and Florian Pollak

This document contains a proof of the Cayley-Hamilton theorem based on the
development of matrices in HOL/Multivariate Analysis.

http://afp.sourceforge.net/entries/Cayley_Hamilton.shtml

Thanks to the authors!
